channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Product_Order_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller Datatype Description This is the datatype that needs to be populated and sent to SoftLayer_Product_Order::placeOrder. This datatype has everything required to place an application delivery controller order with SoftLayer. Local applicationDeliveryControllerId An optional [[SoftLayer_Network_Application_Delivery_Controller]] identifier that is used for upgrading an existing application delivery controller. Type: integer bigDataOrderFlag Flag for identifying an order for Big Data Deployment. Type: boolean
